definition: a plain/ping, unit of area equal to approx. 3.3058 square meters (used in Japan and Taiwan)
Jiancaoping district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi
Jiancaoping district of Taiyuan city 太原市[Tai4 yuan2 shi4], Shanxi

sentences.english: I had hardly mowed my lawn before it started to rain.
sentences.chinese: 我一割完草坪，就下起雨來。

sentences.english: The Northeast is one of the relatively few regions in the country that are actually well suited to lawns.
sentences.chinese: 北東郡是這個國家少數相對適合種植草坪的郡縣之一。

sentences.english: That's far uglier than a yellowing lawn.
sentences.chinese: 這遠比黃色的草坪更難看。

sentences.english: I love all those magnificent trees on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡草坪上所有那些高大的樹。

sentences.english: Meadow planting. New island beds directly adjacent to the water, were designed into the new patio.
sentences.chinese: 直接與水體毗鄰的草坪種植島被設計成新的露臺。

sentences.english: Off the plane you see waves are green and full of trimming the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 一下飛機，滿眼都是綠，到處是修整的草坪。

sentences.english: The lawn was dotted over with timber.
sentences.chinese: 草坪上四處散置着木材。

sentences.english: We sprinkle the lawn every day .
The lawn was shadowed by a linden tree.
sentences.chinese: 椴樹的樹影投身在草坪上。

sentences.english: You shall not really be walking on the lawn.
sentences.chinese: 你真不該在草坪上散步。

sentences.english: The lawn was again searched with a lantern .
sentences.chinese: 她們又打着燈籠，把草坪搜了一遍。

sentences.english: The children were romping about on the lawn.
You can engage in croquet on the south lawn.
sentences.chinese: 你可以參加南邊草坪上的槌球遊戲。

sentences.english: Sometimes, I dress like a lawn guy and carry a rake.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，我拿一個耙子想一個修正草坪的傢伙。

sentences.english: They were sitting on the lawn under a large beech tree.
sentences.chinese: 他們在一棵高大的山毛櫸樹下的草坪上坐着。

definition: Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
